data: two years | a year | ten months

The circumstances related in our last chapter fearfully aggravated the state of things which had now continued two years: a year after the unfortunate visit of Miss Heritage to London, and nearly ten months after the embarkation of Dr. Leroy for India.
Woodburn Grange: A story of English country life; vol. 3 of 3
